body: "pdp:serve:ssr:local": "cd dist/apps/dcsg-ngx-pdp-ui && set PORT=4000& set LOG_LEVEL=detail& set EXPRESS_LOG_LEVEL=detail& set PROXY_LOG_LEVEL=debug& set REQUEST_TIMING_ENABLED=true& set ACTIVE_CLOUD_PROVIDER=AZ& node server/server",
Update pdp:serve:ssr:local script.description: Updates the serve:ssr:local script in package.json
